format_summary: Across six audition episodes we will have three Golden Mics. A Golden Mic means a direct entry into the Top 16. Each judge will have 1 Golden Mic each. In addition to the Golden Mics approximately 30 more participants will be shortlisted for the Piano Round. (15 boys + 15 girls)
notes: 16 eliminations 4 going forward

format_summary: Each act gets approximately 10 minutes which includes pre-chat performance and post-chat. Songs must be limited to 3–4 minutes. Each week one Golden Mic will be given — those contestants will earn a direct spot in the Top 16. Some contestants will be eliminated while others will be given another opportunity during the final week of the Piano Round.
notes: 5 boys perform in piano round 2 eliminations 3 going forward

notes: 20 People (10 boys + 10 girls) 5 eliminations 5 going forward

format_summary: Judges score for all 16 contestants. At the end of weekend's episode Bottom 3 are announced as per the judges score. From these Bottom 3 the contestant with lowest viewer votes from previous week (Week 9) will be eliminated from the competition + contestants Continue to ask for Viewer Votes
notes: 16-1 = 15 contestants proceed to the next round

format_summary: FINALE WEEK Non-Live/ LIVE Grand Finale week where there will be dramatic buildup leading to the announcement of the Winner of PAKISTAN IDOL based on viewer votes of week 18 & 19. The Finale Week will be a mix of performances of contestants special guests and judges
notes: Top 7 perform for one last time. On basis of audience votes top 3 will be decalared. 7-4= 3 From Top 3 we will announce WINNER on basis of audience Votes.
